text:
Good morning
...Oh, what a nice smell.

Good morning, Amana-chan.
What's up? You seem really excited.

Hehe, well~
Right now, Tenka-chan is trying to make cocoa!

If she succeeds, she said she'll let
Amana and Chiyuki-san taste it!

...I see.
So you've been stirring to prevent it from burning.

Hehe, in that case...
Let's enjoy the hospitality!
